document_data.name: Fort Ilbratha
document_data.mainbody: '''Fort Ilbratha''' was the name given to an abandoned fort in the eastern foothills of the [[Troll Mountains]], on the eastern border of [[Amn]].
document_data.Description: The log palisade that once ringed the fort was burned to the ground and entirely erased, but the stone foundations survived into the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Geography: The fort lay on the eastern side of the Troll Mountains, and controlled the quickest east–west pass through mountains. This pass was also the only one that didn't lead into the [[Snakewood]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Amn}}
